cause.description:
we aim to reinvent the way the youth of today think. to many of them have been brainwashed by mtv and the fear state created by george bush's republitard administration. we aim to make the of today think for them selves and to listen to smarter music not trendy aimless mindless bullshit. we don't wnat any money but the cause would always apreciate beer money. all you need to do is find someone between the ages of 14 and 18 and introduce them to inteligent music and ways of thought
1. ignorance needs to quit
2. the youth need to wake up
3. down with facsism
cause.mission: stop the trend of stupidity and ignorance
cause.name: the reinteligizing the youth of today
